name: 365 Birthdays
description:
This is a game I made for fun over the past few months. It's not quite a horror game, not quite an RPG, but its an odd little story about birthdays, grief, and the Celtic underworld's fall from grace. I don't have too much else to say other than that I hope you enjoy it! Be on the lookout for hidden paths...  

Oh, and a free art book comes with the game. Please take a look AFTER you have played it for it contains spoilers!

(CW: This game contains some blood, violence and potentially disturbing images. Dont forget to save!)
